extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  Level 4 and (registration in a POLS major or medial plan) and POLS250 and (a GPA of 2.5 on all units in POLS).

basic.description: An analysis of texts that take the nature of humans as the basis for political argument. Emphasis is on the search for foundations for political claims and the nature of 20th-century relativism, cultural and moral.
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: Political Theory: Appeals to Human Nature
